content.text: Match ends, Crystal Palace 5, Leicester City 0.
Second Half ends, Crystal Palace 5, Leicester City 0.
Foul by Patrick van Aanholt (Crystal Palace).
Demarai Gray (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Goal!  Crystal Palace 5, Leicester City 0. Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the high centre of the goal.
Penalty Crystal Palace. Christian Benteke draws a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty conceded by Harry Maguire (Leicester City) after a foul in the penalty area.
Foul by Adrien Silva (Leicester City).
Joel Ward (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt missed. Wes Morgan (Leicester City) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is high and wide to the right.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Christian Benteke replaces Andros Townsend.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Lee Chung-yong replaces Ruben Loftus-Cheek.
Goal!  Crystal Palace 4, Leicester City 0. Patrick van Aanholt (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from outside the box to the bottom right corner.
Attempt saved. Jeffrey Schlupp (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Wilfried Zaha with a through ball.
Substitution, Crystal Palace. Jeffrey Schlupp replaces James McArthur.
Goal!  Crystal Palace 3, Leicester City 0. Ruben Loftus-Cheek (Crystal Palace) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Mamadou Sakho with a through ball.
Corner,  Crystal Palace. Conceded by Aleksandar Dragovic.
Adrien Silva (Leicester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace).
Fousseni Diabat√© (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Jamie Vardy (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by James McArthur (Crystal Palace).
Attempt missed. Andros Townsend (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is high and wide to the left from a direct free kick.
James McArthur (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Ben Chilwell (Leicester City).
Yohan Cabaye (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jamie Vardy (Leicester City).
Attempt missed. James McArthur (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Patrick van Aanholt.
Attempt missed. Patrick van Aanholt (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the left side of the box is too high. Assisted by James McArthur.
James McArthur (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick on the right wing.

Riyad Mahrez (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Corner,  Crystal Palace. Conceded by Ben Chilwell.
Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) is shown the red card.
Foul by Marc Albrighton (Leicester City).
Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

Ben Chilwell (Leicester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Yohan Cabaye (Crystal Palace).
Attempt blocked. Marc Albrighton (Leicester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Yohan Cabaye (Crystal Palace) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Attempt blocked. James McArthur (Crystal Palace) left footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Wilfried Zaha.
Harry Maguire (Leicester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace).
Substitution, Leicester City. Aleksandar Dragovic replaces Wilfred Ndidi because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City) because of an injury.

Foul by Luka Milivojevic (Crystal Palace).

Second Half begins Crystal Palace 2, Leicester City 0.
Substitution, Leicester City. Adrien Silva replaces Hamza Choudhury.
First Half ends, Crystal Palace 2, Leicester City 0.
